pageContext.claim: “We have no idea who they are. There are plenty of criminals in that group [the migrant caravan], and you understand that, that's just common sense, but you understand that, and we're not going to allow them to come into our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump says "we have no idea who they are" but then contradicts himself by saying "there are plenty of criminals in that group." In fact, the migrant caravan from Central America includes families, women and children. The Trump administration describes them as an urgent threat but they have shown no evidence that criminals are in the group.
